availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Independence, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth C. McCollum. Father of James A. McCollum, Charles McCollum, John McCollum, and Samuel McCollum. Farmer in Independence in 1860. Registered for the draft in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Independence, p. 4; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Independence Precinct, p. 5; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865); Record Group: 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War); Collection Name: Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records); NAI: 4213514; Archive Volume Number: 3 of 3, Kentucky, Kenton County, June/July 1864, p. 154; Find A Grave, "Elijah Johnson McCollum (1823-1884)," Memorial #128268993, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=128268993&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017).
